user.title: Setup Tesla BLE
user.description: Select the Tesla vehicle to pair with. Ensure the vehicle is awake and nearby.

pair.title: Pairing with Vehicle
pair.description: A pairing request has been sent to the vehicle. Please confirm the pairing on the vehicle's touchscreen or by tapping your NFC key card on the center console.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the vehicle. Ensure it is in range and Bluetooth is enabled.
error.pairing_failed: Pairing failed. The request was timed out or rejected by the vehicle.
